bug.author: kehuangms
bug.summary: [BUG] Need to add `scrapbook`, `nltk`, `seqeval`, and `transformers` packages as dependencies in setup file
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The package scrapbook, nltk, seqeval, and transformers are missing if follow the setup file. We will need to add this package as dependency. The new environment is created on a GPU machine. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Cannot replicate this issue and other people did not found this issue. Close it.
